#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int


ll dp[302][100002];
ll mod = 1000000007;
ll fact[504];

void fac()
{
    ll i,j ,k,p;
    fact[0]=1;
    for(i=1;i<500;i++)
        fact[i]=(i*fact[i-1])%mod;

}

ll pre(ll n,ll sum)
{
    //cout<<n<<" "<<sum<<"\n\n";
    if(sum<0)
        return 0;
    if(n==0 && sum==0)
        {
            dp[0][0];
            return 1;
        }

    if(n==1)
       {
           dp[n][sum]=1;
           return 1;

       }

    if(dp[n][sum]!=-1)
        return dp[n][sum];

    ll kk = ( pre(n-1,sum) + pre(n,sum-n) )%mod;

    dp[n][sum]=kk;
    return kk;



}



int main()
{
    ll i,j,k,p,r,s,t;

    fac();

    memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
    //pre(300,100000);

    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        p = (n*(n+1))/2;
        m=m-p;

        if(m<0)
            cout<<"0\n";
        else
        {
            dp[n][m] = pre(n,m);

            cout<<(fact[n]*dp[n][m])%mod<<"\n";
        }

    }
    return 0;
}
